mapper.select: select b_no, b_title, b_writer, b_image from book where b_no between 1 and 12
select rownum, b_no, b_title, b_writer, b_image from (select b_no, b_title, b_writer, b_image from book order by b_year) where rownum <= 12
select rownum, p_id, p_no, p_title from (select p_id, p_no, p_title from post where p_no like #{group}||'%') where rownum <= 3
select * from post where p_no like #{group}||'%'
select count(*) from post where p_no like #{group}||'%'
mapper.update: update customer set cust_no = #{cust_no}, manager = #{manager} where cust_no = #{cust_no}
update book set b_no = #{b_no}, b_title=#{b_title}, b_count = #{b_count}, c_no = #{c_no} where b_no = #{b_no}
update post set p_id = #{p_id}, p_no = #{p_no}, cust_no = #{cust_no} where p_id = #{p_id}
update borrow set bor_no = #{bor_no}, bor_date = #{bor_date}, return_date = #{return_date}, return_ok = #{return_ok}, cust_no = #{cust_no}, b_no = #{b_no} where bor_no = #{bor_no}
